column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/2b45345aaca9d0091972f983ac6e5c0b09d14777 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
As you already go through style cleanups here, I was thinking about removing the excessive use of "{" "}" there around one-liner if-else-statements.\n
I'd favor this, but I guess @laanwj will kill me then ;).\n
